About this package
------------------
This package and documentation was created by Nishad Manohar under the supervision of Professor Sophia Economou and Professor Edwin Barnes.

This project involves code developed for the Quantum Software II class at Virginia Tech under Professor Nicholas Mayhall

This project involved the assistance of the above individuals, as well as Bikun Li, Eva Takou, and Tarek Razzaz.

Contact: nrmanohar21@vt.edu
